snippet: Surveys of manufacturers in many countries appear to indicate that the trade-led recovery of 2010 and 2011 is stalling out or even reversing. The charts reflect the proportion of manufacturers each month who said export orders are increasing. A...
lead_paragraph: Surveys of manufacturers in many countries appear to indicate that the trade-led recovery of 2010 and 2011 is stalling out or even reversing. The charts reflect the proportion of manufacturers each month who said export orders are increasing. A figure of 50 indicates as many said orders were growing as said they were declining. A figure well above 50 indicates most said orders were rising, while one well below the figure indicates the opposite. They reflect surveys over the past year in the four largest euro zone countries and in four other major exporters.

headline.seo: Off the Charts: Indications of a Trade Slowdown
